t: What is Reddit's opinion of EZ-Sweetz (2.0oz - Liquid Sweetener 800 Servings/Bottle) (Original, 1 Pack)?
s: My first was EZ-sweetz brand, and I was happy with that. I then purchased sweetzero drops, and I don't think I would purchase again. Seemed like it leaked and crystallized somehow. I also like the built in dropper from ezsweetz, as opposed to the dip and squeeze method from sweetzero.
